newsitem.title: USA: Pitney Bowes says Carole St. Mark resigns.
newsitem.headline: Pitney Bowes says Carole St. Mark resigns.

text.p: Pitney Bowes Inc said Wednesday Carole St. Mark will resign as president and chief executive of Pitney Bowes Business Services effective July 1.
A company spokesman said she will be replaced by David Rupert, president of Pitney Bowes Management Services. Pitney Bowes Mangement Services is a division of the Business Services group, he said.
A Pitney Bowes spokesman said St. Mark resigned to seek new career opportunities.
Pitney Bowes said St. Mark will work as a consultant to the company for the rest of the year.
